body:
CREATE Trigger dbo.$TabloAdi$_InsOfDelete  ON [dbo].[$TabloAdi$]
Instead Of Delete
AS
	/* Yazan  : $USER$
		Tarih : $DATE$
	*/
SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN
	BEGIN TRY
	Declare 
	/* Cursor Variables*/
	Declare c$TabloAdi$_Insert Cursor For
	Select 
	From	Deleted d
	Open c$TabloAdi$_Insert
	Fetch Next From c$TabloAdi$_Insert Into
	While @@Fetch_Status=0 Begin
	
		Delete $TabloAdi$ Where id = @id

		Fetch Next From c$TabloAdi$_Insert Into
	End
	Close c$TabloAdi$_Insert
	Deallocate c$TabloAdi$_Insert
	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH
		Declare @ITObjectName nvarchar(126)
		Set @ITObjectName = OBJECT_NAME (@@PROCID)
		Execute SP15_GenerateError @ITObjectName
	END CATCH
END
